casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1946.

(December 4, 1946.) Akos Horvath et al., Individually and as Copartners Doing Business under the Names of Phillipsburg Textile Print Works and Clark Mills Company, v. Jacob E. Weissman.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, with $10 costs. Present — Martin, P. J., Townley, Dore, Cohn and Callahan, JJ. [See ante, p. 776.]
